metadata.synopsis: Vignette: Sobering Up one-liners. Guard from the counting house got absolutely hammered during her lunch break.

0.speaker: Cashguard Taslim
0.text: I've got a game for you. You take a drink. Then I take a drink. Then we're both drunk! Haa.
0.context: NodeContext: absolutely hammered out of her tree.

1.speaker: Cashguard Taslim
1.text: This uniform's neat, isn't it? But why am I - ohhh, wait - I had a shift at the Counting House. Oops.
1.context: NodeContext: absolutely hammered out of her tree. Oops is said with a laugh
